result.title: Scientific outreach (publications, participation to events) and organisation of an end conference
result.description: Scientific outreach (publications, participation to events) and organisation of an endconference (M1-M48): - Three summer schools for all young researchers in the project with invitations to other researchers outside the consortium (M15, M27, M39)- Scientific special issue for an professional agro-expert audience (M42)- Min. 30 individual contributions at 10 conferences across EU, with due attention for appearances in member states not directly represented by the consortium (EU Outreach strategy) (M1 to M48)- A three day end conference on the project, with two days of workshops and seminars and one day of excursion to local Lighthouse demonstration pilots (M48)Amendment justification: Extension of 12 months necessary due to COVID-19 related delay and limited activities

result.title: Policy Report
result.description: "Policy report on science-based policy recommendations on how to improve effectiveness of EU regulations and directives related to nutrient recycling, OC soil stock improvement and GHG emission abatement (“Roadmap for more systemic evolutions for optimized nutrients use throughout Europe”) with ""recommendations for overcoming imbalances in nutrient supply between intensive and extensive agricultural regions"".Lead by THUENEN and UGent."
